title: Intervention
description: The method to improve health or wellbeeing, like therapies, drugs, supplements, actions.

references.description: The act of intervening, interfering or interceding with the intent of modifying the outcome. In medicine, an intervention is usually undertaken to help treat or cure a condition.

id.description: a unique identifier within all interventions, in case of drugs same as rxnorm if applicable

rxnorm_code.description: a unique identifier for drugs within the rx norm

name_short.description: the short (display) name of the intervention

name.description: the full (display) name of the intervention

application_route.description: The way, the intervention intrudes, contacts or is applied to the biological system

description.description: the detailed name, the medical name, and short explanation of the intervention, does not need to contain application instruction, because it is a separate property

instruction.description: short protocol as step by step description how to apply the intervention and dosis

requirements.description: a list of displayed names of required actions or states before the intervention

items.description: the full display name of an requirement (e.g. timing) or code of another intervention

risks.description: a list of displayed names of potential side effects of the intervention
